title: Beauty benefits of fish eggs, caviar
text: Caviar, the delicacy of the rich and famous, has emerged as the luxe beauty ingredient everyone is going gaga over. Theseare preserved to perfection with salt, bringing copious benefits of the ocean to the beauty basket. It is most commonly obtained from Ossetra, Sevruga, and Beluga Sturgeon species, Beluga being the most expensive type of all. A, caviar’s high nutritional content is probably why it is such a big hit on the platter. But there’s more to this high-end food item that has made it a wonder ingredient in the skincare and haircare line. The cost of this beauty powerhouse can go as high as seven lakh for a kilogram, so it becomes imperative to discern if it is worth the moolah or is just another hollow hype. Let’s find out.Marine elements like sea salt and algae are known for having beauty benefits. Essentially a marine element, caviar also holds the benefits of sea minerals. Our skin is made of proteins and amino acids. Since caviar is rich in amino acids, it gets absorbed in the skin immediately and makes you look rejuvenated and younger. The tiny eggs also help produce better quality collagen as the cell structure is similar to that of the human skin cell. Like most sea foods, it isthat help in providing ato your skin. Caviar extract is known to for itsproperties and contains nutrients and antioxidants that heal, regenerate and protect the skin.
description: Caviar, essentially fish eggs, has revolutionised the beauty industry, and there’s every reason for it to be your latest obsession.
